name: HONEY-POWAH
description:
3rd PLACE @ Komiks Game Jam 2 in Łódź, Poland.

In this game you become a Bear - Bear who protects his honey from being eaten by other wild animals like: boar, rabbit, squirrel, deer etc. By default his WORST SUPERPOWER (theme of Komiks Game Jam 2) is Stealing Superpowers, while others don't have ANY superpowers - sounds useful and worst right? We tought that isn't enought and we added some other superpowers ;)

Shitty Rain - just a rain full of bear shit, while our Bear touch it while it is falling - game over.

Invisible - being INVISIBLE - sounds cool right? But Bear is being Invisible while there is no animals around him.

LSD Addict - probably funniest superpower. You are addicted to LSD, while pressing Q you can spit to kill animals, but be aware - your saliva is dangerous to you.

Moonwalk - you know Michael Jackson right? ;)

Made by:

Wioletta Orłowska

Pawel Szpiczakowski (velski.com)

HOTKEYS:

1 - Stealing Superpowers

2 - Add Shitty Rain Superpower

3 - Add Shitty Rain + Invisible Superpowers

4 - Add Shitty Rain + Invisible + LSD Addict Superpower

5 - Add Shitty Rain + Invisible + LSD Addict + Moonwalk Superpower

A / Left Arrow - moving left

D / Right Arrow - moving right

W / Up Arrow / Space - jumping ( press it also on start screen where you have to tap )

Q - Spitting
